column7:
battery

value: 0 > 10

description:
out of battery / almost out of battery / running low on battery / still has some battery left / almost full of battery / full of battery

OnValue:>0
update(on, 1)
enable(source of light)

OnValue:0
update(on, 0)
disable(battery)
write(the flashlight is out of battery)

e:OnHours
update(battery, -1)
